      • indexProviderByName

        public IndexProviderDescriptor indexProviderByName​(String providerName)
        Description copied from interface: SchemaWrite
        Translate an index provider name, into an IndexProviderDescriptor. This method is only used when creating indexes using custom or specific index providers. Normally, IndexType would be used instead, but this is not always accurate enough.
        Specified by:
        indexProviderByName in interface SchemaWrite
        Parameters:
        providerName - The name of the index provider to resolve the descriptor for.
        Returns:
        The provider descriptor with the given provider name.

        public IndexDescriptor indexCreate​(IndexPrototype prototype)
                            throws KernelException
        Description copied from interface: SchemaWrite
        Create index using the given IndexPrototype.
        Specified by:
        indexCreate in interface SchemaWrite
        Parameters:
        prototype - the prototype specifying the relevant schema and configuration of the index to create.
        Returns:
        the IndexDescriptor for the created index.
        Throws:
        KernelException - if the index cannot be created for some reason.

      • uniquePropertyConstraintCreate

        public ConstraintDescriptor uniquePropertyConstraintCreate​(IndexPrototype prototype)
                                                    throws KernelException
        Description copied from interface: SchemaWrite
        Create a unique property constraint based on the given uniqueness index prototype. The given index prototype will be used for creating the uniqueness index backing the constraint.
        Specified by:
        uniquePropertyConstraintCreate in interface SchemaWrite
        Parameters:
        prototype - a prototype that describes the constraint index, and includes the schema of the constraint.
        Returns:
        The ConstraintDescriptor of the created constraint.
        Throws:
        KernelException - if the constraint cannot be created for some reason.

      • nodeKeyConstraintCreate

        public ConstraintDescriptor nodeKeyConstraintCreate​(IndexPrototype prototype)
                                             throws KernelException
        Description copied from interface: SchemaWrite
        Create node key constraint based on the given uniqueness index prototype. The given index prototype will be used for creating the uniqueness index backing the constraint.
        Specified by:
        nodeKeyConstraintCreate in interface SchemaWrite
        Parameters:
        prototype - the index prototype for which to create a node key constraint.
        Returns:
        the created constraint.
        Throws:
        KernelException - if the constraint cannot be created for some reason.
